Woodward)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6062419ac9d73b00186e90c1?format=jpeg":null,"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/29/LLSVP.gif?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn80@2020_3/2021/04/03/04-49-57-213_48563141a241fc18.webp","https://i.insider.com/57b752c4db5ce91c008b7dc2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn48@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-47-022_7946741c96d13948.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f93902bf21803001222bc35?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn55@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-46-108_1541436044903b08.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn57@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-622_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mbOowFFEP3U:uYi-FWOSi1g:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn16@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-56-266_a2c0090a9c0cc6c5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mbOowFFEP3U:uYi-FWOSi1g:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn87@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-44-129_a28b095d94d448d6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mbOowFFEP3U:uYi-FWOSi1g:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn46@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-488_ef0664d68762896a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/mbOowFFEP3U":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn35@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-58-691_8eaecb2e0f8193d1.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425373916},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"19 Stanford courses you can take for free online, including a flexible class on designing your dream career","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/stanford-university-free-online-courses","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60677958856cd700198a2fc5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Standford University 4x3\" height=\"1250\" width=\"1667\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Standford; Alyssa Powell/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/harvard-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Harvard</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/princeton-university-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Princeton,</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/yale-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Yale</a>, Stanford offers online courses you can take for free.</li>\n<li>Classes are available in topics from algorithms and game theory to designing your dream career.</li>\n<li>All of the online classes are available on e-learning platforms <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-classes-edx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">edX</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-coursera-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Coursera</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Along with prestigious schools like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/harvard-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Harvard</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-massachusetts-institute-of-technology-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">MIT</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/princeton-university-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Princeton,</a> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/yale-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Yale</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-columbia-university-online-courses-edx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Columbia</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/university-of-pennsylvania-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">UPenn</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cornell-free-online-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Cornell</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-courses-from-best-colleges\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">more</a>, Stanford University offers a robust selection of online courses, many of which you can audit entirely for free. For some, you can also pay to get a certificate of completion to add to your resume or LinkedIn profile.</p><p>The free courses are available on e-learning platforms like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-classes-edx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">edX</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/free-online-coursera-courses\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Coursera</a>, and span across a wide variety of subjects, from game theory and algorithm design to training for healthcare workers. There are also classes designed to broaden your thinking in your current profession, including a class on using love as a force for social justice and a course on designing your ideal career. <strong>You can browse all of Stanford&#39;s online courses <a href=\"https://www.edx.org/school/stanfordonline\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">on edX here</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Fstanford\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">on Coursera here</a>.</strong></p><h3>The 19 best online Stanford classes you can take for free:</h3>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tDesigning Your Career\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e438902281001950a917?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Online classes Stanford Designing Your Career\" height=\"1499\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Julia M Cameron/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 5 weeks</p><p>Put together by the Stanford Life Design Lab, this self-paced, non-linear course is perfect for those who are completely stuck as far as what they want to do in their careers. Learners go over how to break into a completely new field, network efficiently, and keep up professional contacts that can genuinely pay off later.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fdesigning-your-career\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tAmerica's Poverty and Inequality Course\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc7b41250e71a001155864c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"girl learning language\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images / Credit: damircudic</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 9 weeks</p><p>This is a crash course on the income inequality and poverty issues that face America today, exploring how they correlate with race and gender. One key feature of this course is that, while it brings in top scholars to discuss the issue, it breaks down the lectures into short, comprehensive videos. Each video is paired with readings and offers the most up-to-date findings and statistics.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Famericas-poverty-and-inequality-course\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tGiving 2.0\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e89852f11d0019431958?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses person on laptop in bed drinking coffee\" height=\"4254\" width=\"5672\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Vlada Karpovich/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 4 weeks</p><p>For anyone and everyone interested in philanthropy, this course helps learners assess and beef up their non-profit strategy, use technology to their benefit, and volunteer more effectively. It also provides opportunities to meet up and discuss ideas with small virtual groups.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=40328&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Flearn%2Fphilanthropist%23syllabus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on Coursera here</a></h3>\n\tInternational Women's Health and Human Rights\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e8ac902281001950a93e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Woman working at computer\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Young woman reading from the computer and taking notes at her notebook.\n<p class=\"copyright\">MStudioImages/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 10 weeks</p><p>No matter your line of work, this course can help deepen your understanding of the obstacles women face all over the world &#8212; including poverty, food insecurity, gender discrimination, unequal access to education, and violence, among others. Students cover topics such as HIV/AIDS, reproductive health, sex trafficking, war, refugee crises, and education while participating in engaging discussions about these issues.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Finternational-womens-health-and-human-rights\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tLove as a Force for Social Justice\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e92f902281001950a942?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online classes person on laptop with headphones at kitchen table\" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ekaterina Bolovtsova/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 6 weeks</p><p>This class is designed to emphasize the importance of love not just in our personal lives, but as a force for good. In six weeks of classes, love is explored through multiple lenses, including biology, religion, and ethical beliefs. The course also discusses the importance of non-violent communication and ways to strengthen a community, so you can leave with a greater idea of how to utilize love in fighting for different social justice causes.</p><h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=40328&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Flearn%2Flove-social-justice\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on Coursera here</a></h3>\n\tDisaster Medicine Training\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6026c679b3c2a800183cca82?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Slow Factory Foundation\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">RF._.studio/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 8 weeks</p><p>This course was developed through SEMPER, the Stanford Emergency Medicine Program for Emergency Response, and provides a foundation of knowledge for all healthcare professionals involved in disaster medicine. It provides guidance for teams to be self-sufficient for the first 72 hours of a disaster, follow a consistent training curriculum, and pursue new research to strengthen their expertise in this area.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fdisaster-medicine-training\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tAmerican Prophet: The Inner Life and Global Vision of Martin Luther King, Jr.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/602d71f042b84000192f404a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Person typing on computer on desk\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Christina Morillo/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 11 weeks</p><p>While there have been countless books and movies made about Martin Luther King, Jr. and the Civil Rights movement, few explore the deeper feelings of Dr. King himself. Using primary sources &#8212; including his unpublished manuscripts and sermons &#8212; and on-location videos of places King often visited, the course will provide students with a richer understanding of both MLK and his ideas.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Famerican-prophet-the-inner-life-and-global-vision-of-martin-luther-king-jr\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tQuantum Mechanics for Scientists and Engineers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e988902281001950a949?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online classes person typing on laptop\" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ketut Subiyanto/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 9 weeks</p><p>This course is for students with a prerequisite college-level understanding of physical science or engineering. It covers the core concepts and measurements of quantum mechanics, the uncertainty principle, the hydrogen atom, and how to apply these ideas to solve problems in fields such as nanotechnology and photonics.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fquantum-mechanics-for-scientists-and-engineers-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3><p><em>*This course is currently archived, but some course materials are still available.</em></p>\n\tLanguage, Proof, and Logic\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ea45902281001950a956?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses woman sitting on floor with laptop on coffee table\" height=\"1417\" width=\"1890\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Artem Podrez/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 15 weeks</p><p>Critical thinking skills are incredibly important, especially when combatting misinformation. This class breaks down the core of all reasoning &#8212; that one statement has to be the logical consequence of another. Beyond simply helping you debunk false claims or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/online-debate-speech-negotiation-classes\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">win arguments</a>, these lessons can also help you navigate your life more efficiently by making more sound decisions.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Flanguage-proof-and-logic\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tHow to Taper Patients Off of Chronic Opioid Therapy\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ebd8902281001950a95f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"computer work woman freelance wfh\" height=\"2642\" width=\"3522\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">DaniloAndjust/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> One week</p><p>This course covers potentially life-altering ground in a very short amount of time. Healthcare providers learn how to assess the risks and benefits of putting a patient on opioid therapy as well as methods for safely tapering them on or off the medication. They're also provided with a guide on when to refer patients to addiction treatment.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fhow-to-taper-patients-off-of-chronic-opioid-therapy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tGame Theory\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ec4a902281001950a962?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses person on laptop in office chair\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Christina Morillo/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 18 hours</p><p>Game theory is the \"mathematical modeling of strategic interaction among rational (and irrational) agents,\" and beyond applying to literal games, it's used in fields such as economics and politics to make crucial (yet risky) decisions. This course covers the basics of game theory and strategies, applying them to real-life situations such as auctions or computer science problems.</p><h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=40328&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Flearn%2Fgame-theory-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on Coursera here</a></h3>\n\tAlgorithms: Design and Analysis, Part 1\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ec9b902281001950a965?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses woman typing on laptop on table in front of window\" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Andrea Piacquadio/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 6 weeks</p><p>Learners with even a little bit of programming or computer science experience can benefit from this crash-course in algorithms. Students learn about \"Big-oh\" notation, sorting and searching, divide and conquer, randomized algorithms, data structures, and graph primitives. They can also test their knowledge as they go along with programming assessments and quizzes.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Falgorithms-design-and-analysis\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tHow to Learn Math: For Students\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ed0d902281001950a968?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses using graphing calculator \" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">RODNAE Productions/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 6 weeks</p><p>If you're someone who's always struggled with math, this course is for you. It covers easy strategies for learning math more effectively and helps learners challenge their own negative misconceptions about math and their math-learning abilities, so they can exit the course more empowered to use math in their daily lives and professions.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fhow-to-learn-math-for-students-2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tUnderstanding Einstein: The Special Theory of Relativity\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ed6152f11d001943197e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses person smiling in front of laptop\" height=\"1500\" width=\"1999\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Andrea Piacquadio/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 81 hours</p><p>This course helps learners understand the famous theory of relativity by focusing on Albert Einstein himself. Students explore how he came up with his ideas as well as the core elements of the theory, including answering some of the most commonly asked questions about it.&#160;</p><h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=40328&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Flearn%2Feinstein-relativity\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on Coursera here</a></h3>\n\tThinking Critically: Interpreting Randomized Clinical Trials (CME)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6050ca1c3c6489001943b59a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Person on laptop at table petting dog\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Samson Katt/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 1 week</p><p>This quick class goes over the possibilities of biases in clinical trials, and how to reduce them with techniques like randomization. Students watch videos and read samples of clinical research papers to learn how to more critically evaluate them.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fthinking-critically-interpreting-randomized-clinical-trials\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tDefining the String Quartet: Haydn\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065edf2902281001950a96a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses woman in hijab with laptop on bed\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">cottonbro/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 10 weeks</p><p>Composer Joseph Haydn is considered the father of the string quartet, and this course aims to explore both the history and technique behind some of the earliest string quartets. Students also complete an in-depth study of the form, language, and gesture behind Haydn's String Quartet in F minor, opus 20, no. 5 from 1772, and are supplied with musical notations so they can follow along.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fdefining-the-string-quartet-haydn\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tIntroduction to Probability Management\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065ee72902281001950a96d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Stanford online courses person in wheelchair at table with laptop\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Marcus Aurelius/Pexels</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 10 weeks</p><p>All you need prior to starting this course is some general knowledge of Excel. You go over concepts like the Flaw of Averages and the Arithmetic of Uncertainty and learn how to create interactive simulation models in Excel.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6798&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.edx.org%2Fcourse%2Fintroduction-to-probability-management\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on edX here</a></h3>\n\tMachine Learning\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065eee152f11d0019431988?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman working on computer\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kelvin Murray / Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length:</strong> 11 weeks</p><p>Perfect for beginners, this popular course covers the basics of machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition, providing examples on how they're applied to creating smart robots, text understanding, computer vision, and more.</p><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coursera.org%2Flearn%2Fmachine-learning\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Enroll on Coursera here</a></h3>\n\tIntroduction to Food and Health\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6053c525fe6a340019acf726?format=jpeg\" alt=\"girl online learning\" height=\"3384\" width=\"4513\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">KONTROLAB / Getty images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Length: </strong>5 weeks</p><p>For anyone who wants to gain a deeper understanding of nutrition, this documentary-style course covers the basics of healthy eating as well as common food trends. It also features an optional cooking workshop at the end. src=\"https://i.insider.com/60674c1da7d803001963e7c5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Seeking Arrangement\" height=\"1343\" width=\"1791\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Seeking Arrangement</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The investigation into Rep. Matt Gaetz reportedly includes women he met from Seeking Arrangement.</li>\n<li>The platform, a dating app that connects &#34;sugar babies&#39;&#39; and &#34;sugar daddies,&#34; has 10 million users.</li>\n<li>Gaetz has denied ever paying for sex or using websites like Seeking Arrangement.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Seeking Arrangement, a website designed to connect so-called sugar babies and sugar daddies, is making headlines for its reported role in the investigation into allegations that Rep. Matt Gaetz paid women for sex and may have broken sex-trafficking laws.</p><p>A Justice Department investigation is currently active and looking into whether Gaetz, a Republican from Florida, and associates paid women for sex, <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/01/us/politics/matt-gaetz-justice-department.html\">according to The New York Times</a>. Gaetz and his associates reportedly met women from Seeking Arrangement, a popular site for women looking to receive gifts and make money by going on dates or developing relationships with wealthy men.</p><p>The Times reported that the FBI &#34;mentioned the website in conversation with at least one potential witness.&#34;</p><p>Gaetz has denied ever paying for sex or using Seeking Arrangement or similar sites. Seeking Arrangement did not immediately respond to a request for comment.</p><p>The founder of Seeking Arrangement, Brandon Wade, started the service in 2006. Wade&#39;s website says that he graduated from MIT and earned an MBA from the Sloan School of Business after moving to the US from Singapore.</p><p>He wrote in a <a href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2014/09/25/opinion/seeking-arrangement-ceo-on-love/\">CNN op-ed</a> that he felt awkward and alienated as a young man, and that he created Seeking Arrangement to give women &#34;the courage to go after what they really want.&#34;</p><p>&#34;Love is a concept invented by poor people,&#34; he wrote. &#34;Love at first sight that sends shivers down your spine is a fairy tale, and it doesn&#39;t last forever. Such infatuation must be transformed into a selfless form of love, empty of possessive expectations, for any relationship to endure.&#34;</p><p><strong style=\"background-color: #ffff00;\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676134a7d803001963e84c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Brandon Wade\" height=\"975\" width=\"1300\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Brandon Wade</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong>The Seeking Arrangement website states that the service has 10 million active members, with 8 million sugar babies and 2 million sugar daddies (or &#39;mommas,&#39; though Wade notes that that is relatively rare).</p><p>The service is free to sign up, but there are premium options available with paid subscriptions that offer more customization and search priority on the site. The terms and conditions divide users into &#34;Successful Members&#34; and &#34;Attractive Members.&#34;</p><p>Wade <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/brandon-wade-mit-nerd-built-a-10-million-sugar-baby-dating-empire-2012-4#youve-heard-the-founders-story-now-take-a-look-at-his-customers--17\">told Insider in 2012</a> that Seeking Arrangement&#39;s annual revenue was &#34;almost $10 million,&#34; and that the parent company also managed other dating sites, including one dedicated to men paying for women&#39;s travel. </p><p><a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/seekingarrangement\">Crunchbase data shows</a> that Seeking Arrangement is a private, for-profit company, and lists its headquarters as Las Vegas.</p><p>According to Pitchbook, Wade started out consulting at Booz Allen, then began a business venture called SourceGate Systems, Inc. in 2000. &#34;But Wade decided to return the $5 million to its investors after six months battling out with the said business,&#34; according to Pitchbook. After that, he founded Seeking Arrangement and expanded the portfolio of sites to include SeekingMillionare.com and MissTravel. </p><p>Sugar babies on the Seeking Arrangement are encouraged to negotiate an &#34;arrangement&#34; with their partner. The platform bills itself as &#34;relationships on your terms.&#34; </p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60675243856cd700198a2e8d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Seeking Arrangement\" height=\"1560\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jU0DhuaZas4&#38;feature=emb_logo\" target=\"_blank\">Seeking</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/seeking-arrangement-sugar-dating-investors-mentors-2018-6\">Insider reported in 2018</a> that some sugar babies receive mentorship, career guidance, and investments from their sugar daddies in addition to monetary compensation. </p><p>Wade has maintained that the site is not used as a vehicle to pay for sex, but rather as a way to formalize what he said are the unwritten rules of relationships between older, wealthy men, and younger, attractive partners. </p><p>As with other dating apps, the pandemic has affected Seeking Arrangement. In a video from March of last year, Wade told users that the approximately 130 employees of the company were working from home. </p><p>&#34;It should be physical distancing, not social distancing, that is important,&#34; he said. He encouraged people using the app to use the time &#34;to form genuine connections to online courtships,&#34; and said that he was using the app more than usual. He encouraged sugar daddies to send groceries, flowers, or food to their sugar babies as they physically distance. </p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0fnwEWhB4xY\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\"></iframe><p> </p><p>Seeking Arrangement has attracted some attention for being a way for college students to defray the cost of education or the pressure of student loans, and the platform has leaned in to this characterization. It releases an annual ranking of the schools it says have the most sugar babies. &#34;Sugar babies beat student debt,&#34; the <a href=\"https://www.seeking.com/p/?_ga=2.154971068.566831288.1617371738-1872876267.1617371738\">website</a> for their dedicated college program, Sugar Baby U, says.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/seeking-arrangement-sugar-baby-website-founder-owner-2021-4'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/kehpzVtk39o\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 02 Apr 2021 20:27:40 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/60677e0b856cd700198a2ff2?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"fd1bab9445b6d8ba2255d00200e6413d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn92@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-40-570_03bef60a9a05deb4.webp","destWidth":1068,"destHeight":801,"sourceBytes":29512,"destBytes":29512,"author":"awilliams@insider.com (Annabelle Williams)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/60674c1da7d803001963e7c5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn87@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-52-087_b48ae0a2007796c9.webp","https://i.insider.com/60676134a7d803001963e84c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn67@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-52-924_ce3c6cb8658552b9.webp","https://i.insider.com/60675243856cd700198a2e8d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn37@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-52-870_121da8d2d7944a85.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn57@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-622_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=kehpzVtk39o:j0R6SDShSRA:F7zBnMyn0Lo":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=kehpzVtk39o:j0R6SDShSRA:V_sGLiPBpWU":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=kehpzVtk39o:j0R6SDShSRA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn69@2020_4/2021/04/03/04-49-56-663_9f85a45556e79cf7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/kehpzVtk39o":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn19@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-41-746_c6dc8507c613970e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425373765},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"How to connect and pair a PS4 controller to your PC using Bluetooth or a USB cable","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-connect-ps4-controller-to-pc","description":"<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Zhy5GG1e81Q\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\"></iframe><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>You can connect a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B088NS6JJS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bitht_040221_how-to-connect-ps4-controller-to-pc-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B088NS6JJS&linkId=e50ca95582d9f76ffb2cf4b8ae6c9d8882d9f76ffb2cf4b8ae6c9d88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PS4</a> controller to your <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07YNJGMH6/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bitht_040221_how-to-connect-ps4-controller-to-pc-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07YNJGMH6&linkId=5fd14ef6e2e9245c230b4dc18633d224e2e9245c230b4dc18633d224\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">PC</a> via Steam, the DS4 Windows Utility, or Bluetooth.</li>\n<li>To connect your PS4 controller to a PC using Steam or the DS4 Windows Utility, you&#39;ll need a micro-USB cable.</li>\n<li>When you pair your PS4 controller on a PC with Bluetooth, the connection is wireless.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Hardcore <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/pc-gaming\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PC gamers</a> often swear by the precision of a mouse and keyboard - it&#39;s so popular that <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-use-keyboard-and-mouse-on-ps4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">even console players sometimes prefer keyboards to joysticks</a>.</p><p>However, there&#39;s no denying that leaning back with a controller in your hand is much more relaxing than crouching over a mouse and keyboard.</p><p>Fortunately, just like you can connect your mouse and keyboard to a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/ps4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PS4</a>, you can likewise connect your PS4 controller to a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/pc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PC</a>.</p><p>Here are three different ways to connect your PS4 controller to a Windows 10 PC. </p><h2><strong>How to connect PS4 controller</strong><strong> to</strong> PC <strong>with USB </strong></h2><p>If you want to connect the controller with a micro-USB cable (the same cable you use to charge the controller), you have two options.</p><h3><strong>Connect via Steam </strong></h3><p>If you&#39;re a PC gamer, chances are that you have a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-download-steam\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Steam</a> account. Luckily, Steam makes connecting new controllers easy.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> Open Steam and click the &#34;Big Picture Mode&#34; icon in the top-right - it looks like a square with two arrows pointing out.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb59ec432f2170011f6febd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"1   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"1046\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Open Big Picture Mode, which turns Steam into a full-screen application.\n<p class=\"copyright\">William Antonelli/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>2.</strong> Once in Big Picture Mode, select the gear icon at the top-right to navigate to Settings.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb59ef332f2170011f6febe?format=jpeg\" alt=\"2   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can click the power button icon next to the gear to close Big Picture Mode, and Steam.\n<p class=\"copyright\">William Antonelli/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Under the &#34;Controller&#34; tab, click &#34;Controller Settings.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb59f3650e71a001155613e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"3   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Other Steam options, like display and audio controls, can be found here as well.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Check the box for &#34;PlayStation Configuration Support.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb59f7432f2170011f6fec0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"4   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"1080\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Steam has the ability to connect controllers across gaming platforms.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>5.</strong> Plug the PS4 controller into your PC using the micro-USB cable. Make sure the backlight on the controller glows to indicate there&#39;s a connection.</p><p><strong>6.</strong> Steam should automatically detect and configure your controller. Click it when it appears at the bottom of the page.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb59feb50e71a0011556140?format=jpeg\" alt=\"5    How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"650\" width=\"1189\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click the controller&#39;s name when it appears.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jeremy Dreyfuss, Justin Gmoser/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3><strong>Connect via DS4 Windows Utility</strong></h3><p>If you want to use the wired controller with a non-Steam game, this is another option.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> In a web browser on your PC,  go to <a href=\"http://ds4windows.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">DS4Windows.com</a>. Click &#34;Download Now.&#34;</p><p><strong>2.</strong> You&#39;ll be redirected to Github. Find and click the DS4Windows.zip file, and then download it onto your computer.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a04c50e71a0011556143?format=jpeg\" alt=\"11   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"955\" width=\"1655\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The most recent version of this software was released in 2016, but it still works.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Find the downloaded .zip file on your computer and open it, and then double-click &#34;DS4Updater&#34; and click &#34;Extract All.&#34; </p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a08032f2170011f6fec8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"14   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"776\" width=\"1242\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Files with the .zip extension should be extracted before they run.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Pick a location for the files to be extracted to - it should be a location that you can find easily.</p><p><strong>5.</strong> Once extracted, open the location you picked and double-click &#34;DS4Windows.&#34; If you&#39;re asked to confirm that you want to run the program, click &#34;Run.&#34;</p><p><strong>6.</strong> You&#39;ll be asked where you want to save the program&#39;s files. If you don&#39;t care where they go, pick &#34;Appdata&#34; - if you want to be able to move them around, pick &#34;Program Folder&#34; and select a location.</p><p><strong>7.</strong> Once you&#39;ve picked a spot to save the files, click &#34;Step 1: Install the DS4 Driver&#34; and let the program install its files. If you&#39;re asked whether you&#39;d like to install the software, click &#34;Install.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a0ac32f2170011f6fec9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"16   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"857\" width=\"1167\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Assuming you&#39;re on a Windows 10 computer, select the first option.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>You can now use the PS4 controller on your PC with a micro-USB cable, although you may need to restart your computer first.</p><h2><strong>How to connect PS4 controller</strong> <strong>to PC with Bluetooth</strong></h2><p>If your PC supports Bluetooth - and if it was made in the last ten years, chances are it does - you can pair and connect your controller wirelessly.</p><p>This method also works for the newer PS5 DualSense controller, although that controller might not be supported by every game.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> Open your PC&#39;s search menu (you can press the Windows key + Q to open it immediately) and search for &#34;Bluetooth.&#34;</p><p><strong>2.</strong> When &#34;Bluetooth and other devices settings&#34; appears in the search results, click on it.</p><p><strong>3.</strong> Make sure your computer has Bluetooth enabled by setting the switch labeled &#34;Bluetooth&#34; to &#34;On.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a16e32f2170011f6fecc?format=jpeg\" alt=\"6   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"872\" width=\"1127\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Enable Bluetooth connections.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Hold down the Playstation and Share buttons on your controller until the backlight starts flashing.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c614e69331a0011bc66ea?format=jpeg\" alt=\"f91041d4 e83a 41ce 861e 4873e0c674e8_3.7fae6f754ce8fd6de13e37dfd6da4056\" height=\"2032\" width=\"2821\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hold down the PlayStation and Share buttons.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sony; skitching by William Antonelli</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>5.</strong> On your PC, click &#34;Add Bluetooth or other device,&#34; and select &#34;Bluetooth.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a1b250e71a001155614c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"7   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"945\" width=\"1176\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;Bluetooth&#34; is the first, default option - if this doesn&#39;t work, pick &#34;Everything else&#34; instead.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>6.</strong> You&#39;ll see your PS4 controller listed as &#34;Wireless Controller.&#34; Click it to finalize the connection. If you&#39;re asked for a passcode, enter &#34;0000.&#34;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fb5a1d932f2170011f6fece?format=jpeg\" alt=\"8   How to connect PS4 controller to PC\" height=\"911\" width=\"1134\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You may see the controller under an alternative name as well, like &#34;Dualshock 4.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Emma Witman/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><em>Dave Johnson contributed to a previous version of this article</em>.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" In addition to being comfortable and durable, the best duvet covers are easy to put on and won&#39;t slip around or detach from your duvet as you move around in bed. </p><p>Though it&#39;s certainly not a requirement, you&#39;ll most likely enjoy a duvet cover made from the same material as your <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-sheets\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">sheets</a>. Whether you prefer silky sateen cotton or airy linen sheets, look for a matching duvet cover so you can achieve your ideal sink-into-bed environment. </p><p>Learn more about duvet covers and how to shop for them <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-duvet-cover#duvet-cover-faqs-6\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>. We&#39;ll also be consulting bedding experts to learn more about how to shop for duvet covers and adding a video to demonstrate how to best put on a duvet cover. </p></aside>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6067530f856cd700198a2e93?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 brooklinen\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Brooklinen</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Not too hot, not too stiff, and not too boring &#8212; the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.brooklinen.com%2Fcollections%2Fclassic-percale-sheets%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-duvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Classic Duvet Cover from Brooklinen</a> is just right.</h3><p><strong>Pros</strong>: High quality, soft feel, lovely colors</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: A bit pricey, does not include shams</p><p>We're big fans of nearly everything Brooklinen makes, from its sheets to its pillows. Its duvet cover is no exception to our love.&#160;</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.brooklinen.com%2Fcollections%2Fclassic-percale-sheets%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-duvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Classic Duvet Cover</a> is crafted from 100% premium long-staple cotton and has a 270-thread count. One of the things we love about Brooklinen is that it doesn't artificially inflate thread counts like so many other manufacturers do.</p><p>The lightweight percale weave is slightly crisp against your skin, but still pleasantly soft enough to fuel your sweet dreams. There are internal ties to simplify bed making, and large buttons to close the duvet cover once the duvet is inside.</p><p>Choose from several neutral solid colors, including navy blue and cream. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.brooklinen.com%2Fcollections%2Fclassic-percale-sheets%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-duvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Brooklinen</a> also offers the duvet cover in stripes and other patterns.</p>\n\tThe best on a budget\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4eb7c67ed0ee001e25cd8e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 HC collection duvet cover\" height=\"1124\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Set-1500-Egyptian-Quality-Premium-Collection/dp/B00DU1QZ4G/?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=1b5d5ab9e607a657c016fc9e0f5051b4&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow\">HC Collection Duvet Cover Set</a> adds plenty of comfort to your sleeping space without costing you a fortune.</h3><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Inexpensive price, soft feel, easy-care, lots of colors to choose from</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: No inner ties, no twin size, microfiber is not as breathable as cotton</p><p>Made from soft double-brushed microfiber, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Set-1500-Egyptian-Quality-Premium-Collection/dp/B00DU1QZ4G/?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=1b5d5ab9e607a657c016fc9e0f5051b4&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow\">HC Collection Duvet Cover Set</a> is silky and cool against your skin. It's also a great choice for allergy sufferers because microfiber resists dust mites and other allergens. It's also easily machine-washable to further remove tiny particles that might cause asthma or allergy flare-ups.</p><p>Although the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Set-1500-Egyptian-Quality-Premium-Collection/dp/B00DU1QZ4G/?&#38;_encoding=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;linkCode=ur2&#38;linkId=1b5d5ab9e607a657c016fc9e0f5051b4&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow\">HC Collection duvet cover</a> is woven from very fine threads, it resists pilling, wrinkling, shrinking, and staining. The duvet cover is strong and durable, and fairly breathable as well, although microfiber will never beat 100% cotton in that regard. Still, if you are counting your pennies, this is a great deal that looks far more expensive than its actual price.</p><p>However, the manufacturer's claims of \"Egyptian quality\" are a bit deceptive, as those words describe cotton, not microfiber.</p><p>The duvet set closes with buttons, but it has no inner ties to simplify bed making. The set &#8212; which includes two matching shams &#8212; comes in 12 different solid colors, including burgundy, navy, lavender, taupe, and chocolate brown.</p>\n\tThe best zip-up duvet cover\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5bc612eadf918d14773a31da?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 Crane &#38; canopy nova duvet\" height=\"768\" width=\"1024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crane &#38; Canopy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=1210500&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=80389&#38;urllink=&#38;afftrack=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Crane &#38; Canopy's Nova Duvet Cover</a> has a clever zip-up design that makes it easy to use, plus, it has attractive&#160;piping along the edges for added style.</h3><p><strong>Pros:&#160;</strong>Easy to use, great zipper, fun colors and patterns, soft cotton, innovative design</p><p><strong>Cons:&#160;</strong>Pricey</p><p>Putting your comforter into your duvet and making sure it stays put is a difficult task more often than not, but if you have Crane &#38; Canopy's Nova Duvet Cover, it's a lot easier, thanks to built-in ties that hold the duvet and comforter in place and a clever zipper that seals the comforter inside.&#160;</p><p>Decorative piping along the edges of the duvet cover effectively hides the zipper from view, too, so you're left with a sleek, attractive bed that looks like it belongs in a fancy hotel. A couple members of the Insider Reviews team &#8212; myself included &#8212; have tried the Nova Duvet Cover in our own homes, and we love it.</p><p>The 400 thread count, extra-long staple cotton fabric is exceptionally soft right out of the package, thanks to the sateen weave Crane &#38; Canopy uses. You can get the Nova Duvet Cover in a wide range of colors and patterns to suit your style.</p><p>I had a remarkably hard time choosing between the many lovely patterns and colors but settled on the <a href=\"https://www.craneandcanopy.com/products/the-avery-blue-duvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Avery Blue</a>&#160;with its classic diamond pattern that mixes a heavenly shade of blue with crisp white and subtle green accents. It is the softest duvet cover I own, and it's also the easiest to put on top of my Ikea comforter.&#160;<em>&#8212; Malarie Gokey</em></p>\n\tThe best organic duvet cover\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4eb4b2e6ff30001d4e679b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 casper duvet cover\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Casper</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fbedding%2Fsheets%2Fsateen%2F%3FproductType%3Dduvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Sateen duvet cover from Casper</a> is made from organic cotton, and its design details eliminate the typical annoyances of duvet covers.</h3><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Made from high-quality US-grown cotton, cool and crisp, balanced weight, well-designed</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: On the pricey side</p><p>Sateen is a style of weave that exposes more thread surface than percale, creating a satin-like, ultra-soft surface without the high price tag that typically comes with true satin. When used in bedding, like <a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fbedding%2Fsheets%2Fsateen%2F%3FproductType%3Dduvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Casper's Sateen</a>&#160;line, you get a high-quality product that feels soft and incredibly well-made.</p><p>Both Insider Reviews senior reporter, Connie Chen, and executive editor, Ellen Hoffman, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/casper-sheets-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">tested Casper sheets and duvet covers</a>. Connie said the duvet cover had a balanced weight and was well-designed, while Ellen praised the \"superior design details that solve for the annoying inconveniences of typical duvet covers.\"</p><p>In addition to the snaps in each corner that help hold your duvet in place, there are hidden openings that let you easily readjust your duvet if it shifts around in the night. It has a good weight, but it's not so heavy that it overwhelms. A zipper runs along the bottom seam of the duvet cover and discreet flaps keep it hidden so the look stays streamlined.</p><p><a href=\"https://casper.5ad6.net/c/196318/396851/7235?u=https%3A%2F%2Fcasper.com%2Fbedding%2Fsheets%2Fsateen%2F%3FproductType%3Dduvet-cover\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Casper's Sateen Duvet Cover</a> skews toward pricey, but it's 100% organic and competitively priced when pitted against other high-quality bedding. You're also getting a product sourced from high-quality cotton from the US, which is what you're paying for.</p>\n\tThe best for kids\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5930676379474cab0e8b5e21?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 Kids duvet\" height=\"0\" width=\"0\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Where The Polka Dots Roam; Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MXLPCWS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MXLPCWS&#38;linkId=b7464d087bbfec50159b1c30f1935f01\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Reversible Duvet Cover from Where the Polka Dots Roam</a> brings an entire zoo's worth of creatures to keep your child company on the trip to dreamland.</h3><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Super cute and very easy care</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: The fabric is a bit thin</p><p>What kid doesn't love animals? Butterflies, penguins, llamas, foxes, alligators, pandas, and many more cute and colorful creatures adorn <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MXLPCWS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MXLPCWS&#38;linkId=b7464d087bbfec50159b1c30f1935f01\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Where the Polka Dots Roam's Reversible Duvet Cover</a> in animal print. Sure, there are lots of cutesy kids' bedding prints out there. But not all of them will appeal to as vast a range of children (and let's admit it, plenty of adults as well) like this adorable, and yet not too sweet, bedding set. &#160;</p><p>The animal-print <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01MXLPCWS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_060117_best-duvet-covers-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01MXLPCWS&#38;linkId=b7464d087bbfec50159b1c30f1935f01\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Reversible Duvet Cover Set</a> is made from soft, durable, and easy-care microfiber. That means that it will be cozy-soft against your child's skin, is hypoallergenic, shrugs off stains and spills, and easily washes clean without pilling, shrinking, wrinkling, or becoming scratchy. Plus, your little one might even be eager for bedtime when an entire menagerie is waiting to share in the sleepy-time fun. That's a win-win all the way around.</p><p>There are inner ties for the duvet, and the cover closes with a row of buttons. The set includes one pillowcase with the twin duvet cover&#160;and two pillowcases with the full/queen set.</p>\n\tDuvet cover FAQs\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/579ba76088e4a70f018bbdce?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 faqs\" height=\"0\" width=\"0\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lolostock/Shutterstock</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>What's the difference between a duvet, a duvet cover, and a comforter?</h3><p>Although duvets were used for centuries in northern Europe, they didn't really catch on in the UK until the 1970s, and they then spread across the pond to the US a couple of decades later. As duvets and duvet covers are a bit new on the bedding scene in the United States, there's still some confusion over exactly what they are, and how they differ from a comforter.</p><ul><li><strong>What is a duvet?&#160;</strong>A duvet (pronounce it \"due-vay;\" the word comes from the Old French for \"down\") is a type of quilt that is typically solid white and stuffed with feathers, down, or a down alternative. You'll sometimes find duvets referred to as \"down comforters\" in the United States. Duvets are generally warm and snug, although some are lightweight for use in the summertime.</li><li><strong>Why does it need a cover?&#160;</strong>A duvet cover is a fabric \"envelope\" that is used to cover and protect a duvet, in the same way a pillowcase covers and protects a bed pillow. In Europe, it's unusual to use a top sheet; the duvet cover serves the same purpose and is removed for washing along with the fitted sheet. The duvet cover adds color and style to the bedroom, as well. One edge of the duvet cover closes with ties, buttons, or a zipper so you can insert or remove the duvet when it's time to wash the cover.</li><li><strong>How is it different from a comforter?&#160;</strong>Comforters are usually colored or patterned, not solid white, so they don't require a cover to add style. And because comforters are normally used over a top sheet, they don't require an additional layer of fabric for protection from skin oil, sweat, and other nighttime body detritus, either. Comforters are most often stuffed with synthetic fill, although you can also find down-filled comforters.&#160;</li></ul><h3>How to choose a duvet cover</h3><p>For the most part, the right duvet cover is the one you like best. There are nearly endless colors and patterns available, so choose whatever complements your bedroom's d&#233;cor and brings a smile to your face. Aside from style, there are just a few things to know about buying a duvet cover:</p><ul><li><strong>Size:&#160;</strong>Duvet covers are sized the same as regular bedding, so choose the size that matches your duvet; don't go larger or smaller.&#160;You'll find many duvet covers sold with matching shams. That makes it easy to coordinate your bed's good looks.</li><li><strong>Materials:&#160;</strong>Duvet covers are made from the same fabrics as bed sheets. Many are cotton, and as with cotton sheets, the softest, highest quality comes from Egyptian, Supima, or Pima cotton. But don't assume you need a duvet cover with the highest thread-count: 250 to 500 is generally sufficient. While cotton is very popular, you'll also find microfiber and other synthetics, flannel, and jersey duvet covers.</li><li><strong>Care:&#160;</strong>The easier the care, the more often you'll be willing to wash your bedding, so look for duvet covers that safely machine-wash and dry.</li></ul>\n\tHow to put a duvet cover on your duvet\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5bc609cbb09cab135c28ef13?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best duvet covers 2021 how to put duvet cover on\" height=\"675\" width=\"900\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Brooklinen</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The frustration over putting a duvet inside its cover is enough to drive many people back to comforters. But don't give up. Here's how to do it without breaking a sweat or pulling out your hair.</p><ol><li>Start by turning your duvet cover inside out, and then spreading it across your mattress with its opening at the foot of the bed.</li><li>Lay your duvet on top of its cover.</li><li>If your duvet and duvet cover have inner ties, fasten them now. If not, you can use safety pins to fasten the corners of the cover to the duvet, or simply do without.</li><li>Roll the duvet and its cover together like a burrito, starting from the head of your bed. It's easiest if you have a partner, but if not, switch from side to side as you work.</li><li>When your \"burrito\" is rolled, fold the duvet cover opening back around the bedding bundle.</li><li>Close your duvet cover with its zipper, buttons, or ties.</li><li>Unroll your \"burrito\" towards the top of the bed.</li><li>Fluff as necessary, and voila! Your duvet is back in its cover.&#160;</li></ol>\n\tCheck out our other great bedding guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5b90257d04f162f82c8b4d27?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Crane &#38; Canopy\" height=\"844\" width=\"1125\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Crane &#38; Canopy</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-comforter\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best comforters</a></li><li><a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/best-mattress\"><strong>The best mattresses</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-pillow\"><strong>The best pillows</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-pillowcase\"><strong>The best pillowcases</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-sheets\"><strong>The best sheets</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-weighted-blanket\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best weighted blankets</a></li></ul>\n</div><div 50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=5fZ_vgLVmTQ:Bzl47E2D3Fg:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn43@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-57-841_892b4ee386a6297d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/5fZ_vgLVmTQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn36@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-48-638_07ea57a32ed8c1c6.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425374042},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"The Ever Given's crew is safe, still onboard, and is getting paid while the ship's being investigated","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/ever-given-crew-safe-getting-paid-while-ship-under-investigation-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60672f54856cd700198a2dc0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Ever given\" height=\"1966\" width=\"3933\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The &#34;Ever Given&#34; container ship operated by the Evergreen Marine Corporation, sails through the Suez Canal, after it was fully freed and floated.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sayed Hassan/picture alliance via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Egyptian authorities are investigating the Ever Given after it blocked the Suez Canal for six days.</li>\n<li>The National Union of Seafarers of India&#39;s general secretary is hopeful the crew will be absolved.</li>\n<li>The union&#39;s general secretary said the crew will continue to be paid as the inquiry continues.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The 25-person Indian crew of the Ever Given is stressed and tense, but is doing well as the <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/ship-stuck-in-suez-canal-larger-than-empire-state-building-2021-3\">massive container ship</a> faces investigations after <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/ever-given-freed-from-the-suez-canal-2021-3\">blocking the Suez Canal</a>.</p><p>Abdulgani Serang, the general secretary of the National Union of Seafarers of India, gave Insider an update on their wellbeing on Friday.</p><p>The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/suez-canal-egypt-opens-investigation-how-ever-given-stuck-2021-3\">Egyptian government launched an inquiry</a> into the event to uncover what went wrong after the ship became wedged in the canal and upended global trade. Investigators questioned the Ever Given&#39;s crew on Wednesday, Suez Canal Authority Chairman <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-egypt-suezcanal-ship/investigation-begins-into-how-ship-got-stuck-on-suez-canal-idUKKBN2BN10B\">Osama Rabie</a> told local outlets, according to Reuters.</p><p>&#34;There is a clear danger that the crew will be made scapegoats,&#34; a senior authority in the shipping industry told the <a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/suez-blockage-ends-but-indian-crew-may-face-legal-charges/articleshow/81750579.cms\">Times of India</a>. The <a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/suez-blockage-ends-but-indian-crew-may-face-legal-charges/articleshow/81750579.cms\">publication also said</a> the Ever Given&#39;s crew could be placed under house arrest until the investigation is completed.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6067705ca7d803001963e8f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"ever given suez canal\" height=\"985\" width=\"1971\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Ever Given sits beached across the Suez Canal, blocking all traffic. The ship was re-floated on March 29.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Satellite image ©2021 Maxar Technologies</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Serang told Insider that the crew of the Ever Given is safe and awaiting the results of the investigation, and added that reports about the status of the crew have been blown out of proportion.</p><p>&#34;We want the inquiry done so corrective measures can be taken in the future,&#34; Serang told Insider, &#34;but we don&#39;t want to take a guess about house arrest. Let&#39;s not jump the gun and just wait for the results of the inquiry.&#34;</p><p>Despite the investigation, Serang told Insider he&#39;s optimistic that the crewmembers won&#39;t face consequences.</p><p>&#34;We are hopeful that the inquiry will come out that the seafarers end up clean,&#34; Serang said. &#34;As of now, the reports are that it was purely a weather-related incident.&#34;</p><p>The Ever Given was <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/ever-given-logged-speed-limit-before-running-aground-suez-2021-3\">traveling faster than the speed limit of the Suez Canal</a> before getting stuck, <a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-27/how-a-desert-wind-in-suez-canal-blew-global-trade-off-course\">Bloomberg reported</a>. Initial investigations suggested the ship became beached due to high winds and ruled out any mechanical or engine failures.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6066375852f11d0019431b28?format=jpeg\" alt=\"ever given great bitter lake\" height=\"880\" width=\"1920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A radar image taken by the Sentinel-1 satellite shows the Great Bitter Lake on March 31. The Ever Given is the bright ship on the lake&#39;s eastern side.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Satellite image ©2021 Maxar Technologies</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>The union secretary also said the Ever Given&#39;s crew will continue to get paid even as the ship <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/ever-given-anchored-suez-artificial-lake-satellite-images-show-2021-4\">waits inspection in the Great Bitter Lake</a> to determine if it can continue to its port of call.</p><p>&#34;Bernhard Schulte Shipmanagement is a company of repute,&#34; Serang said, &#34;and the company and union have an agreement in place. All the things will be taken care of and there is no cause to worry whatsoever.&#34;</p><p>The owners of the Ever Given recently filed a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/ever-given-owners-filed-a-lawsuit-against-the-ship-operators-2021-4\">lawsuit</a> in the High Court of London, <a href=\"https://www.thelawyer.com/hfw-issues-ever-given-claim-after-suez-canal-blockage/\">The Lawyer reported</a>. According to a spokesperson for Evergreen Marine Corporation, the ship&#39;s operators, the filing is in relation to the Merchant Shipping Act 1995 and relates to liability and compensation claims related to the beached ship.</p><p>The preemptive lawsuit was filed to limit the potential damages faced by the owners of the Ever Given and was not filed in retaliation against the ship&#39;s crew, <a href=\"https://www.maritime-executive.com/article/ever-given-s-owner-files-suit-and-declares-general-average\">The Maritime Executive reported.</a></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original
