class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong>When a new baby arrives it changes everything, even laundry. What detergent should you be using to protect your precious new arrival?</strong></li>\n<li>Of all the detergents out there, none is better for babies than <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07GWW54HL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07GWW54HL&linkId=08290e82340ec9fb0fa2051b03a2dcb2340ec9fb0fa2051b03a2dcb2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>All&#39;s free clear liquid detergent</strong></a>.</li>\n<li><strong style=\"color: #222222;\">It protects your baby&#39;s sensitive skin and delivers the cleaning power needed for the whole family&#39;s laundry at an affordable price.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>Bringing a new baby home is both an exciting and sometimes overwhelming time. The little one is relying on you for everything including clean clothes and bedding that will not irritate delicate skin.</p><p>According to Cleveland Clinic pediatric dermatologist Joan Tamburro, DO; &#34;A child who has skin problems may be more prone to laundry detergent reactions. A family history of atopic dermatitis (eczema) also may put your infant at higher risk.&#34;</p><p>As a laundry and housekeeping professional, I&#39;ve been testing products for companies, agencies, and publications for many years. So with the birth of my first grandchild, I was delighted to be able to lessen one anxiety by recommending the best laundry detergent for both the baby and his parents.</p><p>The main culprits in commercial laundry detergent that causes skin irritation and allergic reactions are dye and fragrance. By choosing a product that is dye and scent-free, the detergent can be used for not only baby&#39;s clothes but all household laundry. </p><h2>Here are the best baby laundry detergents:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best baby laundry detergent overall: <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">all free clear liquid laundry detergent</a></strong></li><li><strong><a baby laundry detergent for the environment: <a baby laundry detergent for tough stains: <a overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c5c5923a265161b9557223f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"all free clear detergent\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you are looking for a reasonably-priced, effective laundry detergent that is safe for your baby's delicate skin and can be used for the rest of the family's laundry, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07GWW54HL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07GWW54HL&#38;linkId=08290e82340ec9fb0fa2051b03a2dcb2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">All's free clear liquid detergent</a> is your best bet.</h3><p><strong>What we like: &#160;</strong>Performs well for both baby and family laundry, mid-priced, readily available in mass-market stores and online, free of dyes and perfumes</p><p>As I was testing and selecting a laundry detergent for our precious new one, I took into consideration the product's ingredients, cleaning ability, cost per load, and ease of use. As a new parent, the last thing you need is a product that makes the laundry routine any more complicated.</p><p>The final verdict after testing more than 10 products was that <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07GWW54HL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07GWW54HL&#38;linkId=08290e82340ec9fb0fa2051b03a2dcb2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">All free clear liquid</a> will give a baby the protection he needs from irritation, remove all but the worst stains, not break the budget, and can be used to wash clothes for the entire family. It is also the most highly recommended detergent brand for sensitive skin by dermatologists, allergists, and pediatricians.&#160;</p><p>It seems others agree with me as well. On <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents/https://www.walgreens.com/store/c/all-laundry-detergent-liquid-with-stainlifters-free-%26-clear/ID=prod3458416-product\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Walgreens</a>, all free clear has a rating of 4.8 out of five stars. One reader states, \"I'm so sensitive, allergic to everything! This is the only detergent that I can use that doesn't cause a reaction. Even other \"Free\" products cause me to react.\"</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07GWW54HL/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07GWW54HL&#38;linkId=08290e82340ec9fb0fa2051b03a2dcb2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">All free clear</a> comes in liquid, powder, and single dose packs. I would recommend the liquid formula, costing about 20 cents per load, because it can also be used to pretreat stains. Just work in a tiny amount of the liquid into the stained area with your fingers or a soft-bristled brush and wait about 15 minutes before washing.</p>\n\tThe best baby laundry detergent for the environment\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c5c5bc30d15f5220f622e89?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Seventh Generation laundry detergent\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Environmentally-friendly <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FVT99YM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FVT99YM&#38;linkId=02e5fd7cf575fd2d9464fbcc194e998b\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Seventh Generation Baby Concentrated Laundry Detergent</a> also protects your baby's sensitive skin from harsh chemicals.</h3><p><strong>What we like: </strong>Plant and mineral-based ingredients are environmentally-friendly, detergent works well on baby stains and can be used for laundry for the entire family</p><p>Protecting a new baby is always a top priority, but we should never forget that protecting the Earth is also important. After all, our actions today will affect the world that a child faces in the future.</p><p>Seventh Generation products adhere to that philosophy and use only plant or mineral-based ingredients. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FVT99YM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FVT99YM&#38;linkId=02e5fd7cf575fd2d9464fbcc194e998b\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Seventh Generation Baby Laundry Detergent</a> received a 97% rating as a USDA Certified Biobased Product and is never tested on animals.</p><p>One member of the <a href=\"https://www.whattoexpect.com/baby-products/baby-care/laundry-detergents-for-baby/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">What to Expect</a>&#160;community, Lakewood Chick, says \"We use Seventh Generation Free &#38; Clear for everyone's clothes, not just baby. I think it works great and it makes me feel much better knowing harmful chemicals aren't in it.\"</p><p>After giving it a try on our baby's laundry, I was delighted with the results. The plant-based enzymes removed tough formula and diaper stains with ease. Over on <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07FVT99YM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07FVT99YM&#38;linkId=02e5fd7cf575fd2d9464fbcc194e998b\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon</a>, 61% of buyers rated it as a five-star product. The cost at around &#160;25 cents per load is higher but the results are worth it.</p>\n\tThe best baby laundry detergent for tough stains\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c5c5c1770a61e1e447260d6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"babyganics detergent\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Just as babies grow bigger, so do their stains. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00T2CFQUQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00T2CFQUQ&#38;linkId=390069ee881ade0df9992ad17df974de\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Babyganics 3X Baby Laundry Detergent</a> contains the enzymes you need to treat those stains.</h3><p><strong>What we like: </strong>Contains enzymes to tackle tough stains, available in unscented and scented formulas, concentrated formula with an easy-to-handle bottle</p><p>Newborns need to be swaddled with soft, irritant-free fabrics from the moment they are born. Fortunately, other than some diaper accidents, they don't create too many difficult stains. But as they age and are introduced to commercial formulas that contain iron and then those first solid foods, the stains can be a challenge especially if they sit around for several days before being washed.</p><p>That's why I was so pleased to discover that <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00T2CFQUQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00T2CFQUQ&#38;linkId=390069ee881ade0df9992ad17df974de\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Babyganics </a>contains the enzymes protease to break down protein stains (diaper stains) and amylase to tackle starches and carbohydrates stains. What also makes <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00T2CFQUQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00T2CFQUQ&#38;linkId=390069ee881ade0df9992ad17df974de\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Babyganics</a> a good choice is that the formula is plant and mineral-based and carries the USDA Certified Biobased label.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00T2CFQUQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00T2CFQUQ&#38;linkId=390069ee881ade0df9992ad17df974de\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Babyganics Baby Laundry Detergen</a>t has a five-star rating by 61% of buyers on Amazon. One reviewer is particularly pleased with the 3X concentration since \"you don't have to buy it as often as others compared to its size nor need to hold up a bulky container every time you have to do the laundry (pretty important for tired moms).\"</p><p>Developed to use in both standard and high-efficiency washers at a cost of around 23 cents per load, I use <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00T2CFQUQ/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00T2CFQUQ&#38;linkId=390069ee881ade0df9992ad17df974de\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Babyganics liquid detergent</a> as a stain pre-treater before tossing those dirty bibs into the washer. If you like a bit of scent, it also comes in a lavender scent created with natural essential oils.</p>\n\tThe best baby laundry detergent for diapers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5c5c5d0c1631a321162a8ae3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rockin Green detergent\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>Cloth diapers present a laundry challenge to new parents, but <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005DL7LGM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B005DL7LGM&#38;linkId=6836dd90795a3158d498c25e5f3af85a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Rockin' Green Classic Rock Natural Laundry Detergent</a> can make it all easier.</h3><p><strong>What we like: </strong>Mineral-based and contains no petroleum-based products, produced in the United States, removes diaper stains and odor</p><p>Every parent must make the decision on whether to use cloth or disposable diapers with each having its own merits. If cloth diapers are the final choice, learning how to clean and disinfect them properly is a must. Even if you use a diaper service, there will be times when you need to wash a load of diapers at home.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005DL7LGM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B005DL7LGM&#38;linkId=6836dd90795a3158d498c25e5f3af85a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Rockin' Green</a> is a small company based in Texas that tackles the challenge of diaper laundry with a mineral-based powdered detergent that removes tough stains but leaves the fabric feeling soft to the touch. Free of dyes and perfumes, the company also offers a <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005DL5970/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B005DL5970&#38;linkId=257ba507a978a244eddcf2b32e0d5de6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Hard Rock formula</a> if you live in an area with hard water that can leave fabrics stiff and scratchy.</p><p>On <a href=\"https://www.whattoexpect.com/baby-products/baby-care/laundry-detergents-for-baby/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">What to Expect</a>, one community member, Smallsteps, reports that \" I no longer have to add tons of other stuff to get my diapers clean and stink free!\"</p><p>Some 70% of buyers on <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005DL7LGM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_020719_best-baby-laundry-detergents-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B005DL7LGM&#38;linkId=6836dd90795a3158d498c25e5f3af85a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Amazon give the product a five-star rating</a>. I found that if you follow the proper routine of rinsing and pre-soaking soiled diapers and wash them regularly, for less than 20 cents per load your little one will have clean, odor-free diapers every day.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/best-baby-laundry-detergent'>Business Insider</a></div><div border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=S-rEIMufcE4:_89uDu8W8u4:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 02 Apr 2021 20:34:56 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/606766a1a7d803001963e8a7?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"12a3f11299efe755df121b51f5080eb3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn51@2020_3/2021/04/03/04-49-46-622_342fd739f5b061c4.webp","destWidth":1200,"destHeight":900,"sourceBytes":44936,"destBytes":44936,"author":"insider@insider.com (Mary Marlowe Leverette)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5c5c5923a265161b9557223f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn28@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-48-998_a375bd2e960ab5c2.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c5c5bc30d15f5220f622e89?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn7@2020_4/2021/04/03/04-49-52-367_14d783e75b4fe275.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c5c5c1770a61e1e447260d6?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn34@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-55-501_fe09d1020e73e888.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c5c5d0c1631a321162a8ae3?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn76@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-53-074_dd2726539a7e9ae8.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn57@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-622_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=S-rEIMufcE4:_89uDu8W8u4:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn11@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-45-313_3f1a8251faa41869.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=S-rEIMufcE4:_89uDu8W8u4:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn37@2020_3/2021/04/03/04-49-57-021_908adcabdc83fa0c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=S-rEIMufcE4:_89uDu8W8u4:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn75@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-43-875_c9932f310d640574.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/S-rEIMufcE4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn36@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-646_e36c7f3ce47f9dd4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425374004},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"What is BlueStacks? How to use Android apps and games on your Mac or PC","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-bluestacks","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60678895a7d803001963e9a0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"holding phone and using laptop at cafe\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can use BlueStacks to access your Android apps from a computer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">POJCHEEWIN YAPRASERT PHOTOGRAPHY/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">BlueStacks is a popular and free emulator for running Android apps on a PC or Mac computer. </li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">BlueStacks doesn&#39;t look exactly like Android, but it&#39;s easy to use and you can install Android apps from the Play Store. </li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">BlueStacks has modest system requirements and should work with computers running Windows 10, or at least macOS Sierra.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/bluestacks\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">BlueStacks</a> is a popular <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/android\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Android</a> emulator for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/windows\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Windows</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/mac\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Mac</a>. Using BlueStacks, you can run virtually any Android app on your desktop. </p><h2>What is BlueStacks?</h2><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"5f87733c02495a55f705b383\" data-title=\"Emulators can turn your PC into a Mac, let you play games from any era, and more - here's what you should know about the potential benefits and risks of using one one\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-an-emulator\" data-thumbnail=\"https://i.insider.com/undefined\">Related Article Module: Emulators can turn your PC into a Mac, let you play games from any era, and more - here&#39;s what you should know about the potential benefits and risks of using one</bi-shortcode><p>Like any emulator, BlueStacks creates a virtual version of an <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B082XY23D5/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bitht_040221_what-is-bluestacks-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B082XY23D5&linkId=6796f9779e64f2d9ce9a8729c41f178e9e64f2d9ce9a8729c41f178e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Android</a> device that runs in a window on your computer. It doesn&#39;t look exactly like an Android device, but it resembles a phone&#39;s screen well enough that even a first-time user should have no trouble using it. </p><p>BlueStacks is free to download, install, and use. While you can use BlueStacks to run almost any Android app (it&#39;s compatible with about 97% of the apps in the Google Play Store), the app has found its largest audience with Android users who want to play mobile games on their desktop computer.</p><h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/566051ebdd0895131c8b47e2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Candy Crush BlueStacks\" height=\"645\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Candy Crush, a mobile game, being played on a Windows computer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">BlueStacks</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></h2><p>The app is optimized for gamers, but gives direct access to the Google Play Store, and any app can be downloaded using your Google account, just like on an Android device.</p><h2>BlueStacks is a safe and trustworthy app</h2><p>BlueStacks is a legitimate app that&#39;s developed and produced by a major company. As long as you install the program from <a href=\"https://www.bluestacks.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">BlueStacks&#39; website</a>, it&#39;s safe to install and use - installing it from a third-party site might be more risky.</p><p>Even so, some anti-malware utilities might block the installation of the program even from the Bluestack website. As long as you&#39;re installing the official program from Bluestack, it&#39;s safe to proceed.</p><p>It&#39;s also completely legal - although some companies try to argue otherwise, emulators are protected by US law, and can be run like any other app.</p><h2>BlueStacks&#39; main features and capabilities</h2><p>The BlueStacks home screen doesn&#39;t replicate any particular version of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B082XY23D5/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bitht_040221_what-is-bluestacks-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B082XY23D5&linkId=6796f9779e64f2d9ce9a8729c41f178e9e64f2d9ce9a8729c41f178e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Android</a> or phone screen, but it should be easy for any Android user to find their way around. </p><p>The home screen includes an icon for the Google Play Store as well as a collection of system apps (including Settings). A toolbar on the side of the window gives you access to the programs&#39; various modes and features, as well as lets you adjust the volume, take screenshots, rotate the display, and more. </p><p>There&#39;s also a separate settings icon for adjusting BlueStacks&#39; settings - this is different from adjusting the virtual Android device&#39;s settings.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676aa7856cd700198a2f5b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"What_is_BlueStacks 1\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1737\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The BlueStacks home screen shows your installed apps and features a toolbar for controlling BlueStacks and your Android experience.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>You can navigate around using the Back, Home, and Recent Apps icons at the bottom-right of the toolbar.  </p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676b38a7d803001963e8bf?format=jpeg\" alt=\"What_is_BlueStacks 1\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1737\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Use the icons at the bottom of the toolbar to navigate around.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3>BlueStacks&#39; most popular features</h3><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Easy app installation</strong>: You can install Android apps directly from the Google Play Store within BlueStacks in the same way you&#39;d install any app on your phone. If you have an app&#39;s .APK file (the executable app file) you can install it from the BlueStacks toolbar. </li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Integration with PC devices</strong>: BlueStacks integrates seamlessly with your computer&#39;s devices and peripherals, including the mouse, keyboard, webcam, and more. These devices will work as if they were built into your Android device, and Android apps will be able to take advantage of them automatically. </li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Game controls</strong>: Most Android games have a set of default controls that make the best use of the computer&#39;s mouse and keyboard, though you can modify and customize these controls within BlueStacks. </li></ul><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60678682a7d803001963e995?format=jpeg\" alt=\"bluestacks games\" height=\"1083\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A sampling of the most popular games on BlueStacks.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bluestacks</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Multi-instance support</strong>: BlueStacks allows you to open the same game in multiple windows, playing it with two or more accounts at once. You can use this to play multiple games at the same time, to play the same game from several accounts, or even to play multiplayer games with yourself. </li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Macros</strong>: BlueStacks includes a robust macro editor to automate tasks with keyboard shortcuts. </li></ul><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>BlueStacks system requirements and compatibility</strong></h2><p>BlueStacks has fairly modest system requirements and should be able to run on most modern computers without problems.</p><p>Here are the key system requirements for installing BlueStacks:<br><br></p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07YNJGMH6/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=bitht_040221_what-is-bluestacks-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07YNJGMH6&linkId=5ef5df1818294441372a1b79cd3b44c318294441372a1b79cd3b44c3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">PC</a>:</strong> You should have Windows 7 or higher, though Windows 10 is recommended. 2GB of RAM is required, but 8GB or more is recommended. You need at least 5GB hard drive space (SSD is recommended) and broadband internet access. Your PC needs a modern multi-core CPU to successfully run BlueStacks. </li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fbuy-mac%2Fmacbook-pro%2F13-inch\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Mac</a></strong>: You need macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or above, but macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) is recommended. 4GB RAM is required, and 8GB or more is recommended. Likewise, you need at least 8GB of storage space on your hard drive, and an SSD is recommended.  Your Mac needs a modern multi-core CPU to successfully run BlueStacks, and you should have Intel HD 5200 graphics or better. </li></ul></aside><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"604274244d46fc74fc6e44b5\" data-title=\"How to see your Android notification history so you can reference dismissed notifications from the past 24 hours\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-see-android-notification-history\" data-vertical=\"sai\" data-image=\"https://i.insider.com/6042797044d8e300117b9551\">How to see your Android notification history so you can reference dismissed notifications from the past 24 hours</a><a data-type=\"6041774586b3794f0464ec76\" data-title=\"How to change the audio output on an Android without disconnecting your headphones or speakers\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-change-audio-output-on-android\" data-vertical=\"sai\" data-image=\"https://i.insider.com/604293e544d8e300117b95f3\">How to change the audio output on an Android without disconnecting your headphones or speakers</a><a data-type=\"605b9730df8cbf7e7332817d\" data-title=\"The 11 best new features of Android 11 that make your phone more dynamic and easier to use\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/android-11-features\" data-vertical=\"sai\" data-image=\"https://i.insider.com/605b98fc106eb50019d05700\">The 11 best new features of Android 11 that make your phone more dynamic and easier to use</a><a data-type=\"605d1c5f266b2044483d2c86\" data-title=\"What is software? into a police checkpoint. The suspect and a police officer have died.</li>\n<li>The Guard&#39;s presence in Washington, DC, has been elevated since the riot earlier this year.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The National Guard deployed an immediate reaction force to the US Capitol on Friday afternoon after someone rammed a car into a police checkpoint.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676be6856cd700198a2f68?format=jpeg\" alt=\"National Guard troops near the Capitol\" height=\"3024\" width=\"4032\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>National Guard troops near the Capitol.\n<p class=\"copyright\">John Haltiwanger/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>The IRF consisted of soldiers and airmen ready to support the Capitol Police, the Guard said in a statement, adding that &#34;due to operational security, we cannot discuss further details regarding the IRF.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-NGB-PA Press Desk  (@NGBPA1636) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1378050270555480067?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 2, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Guard troops were lined up around the perimeter of the Capitol and were wearing face shields and carrying riot shields. Some appeared to have sidearms; however, most wielded batons in addition to the shields.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676ba8a7d803001963e8cb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"National Guard and killed. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-capitol-is-on-lockdown-over-an-external-security-threat-2021-4\">One Capitol Police officer died of injuries sustained during the attack</a>, and another was hospitalized.</p><p>Videos captured National Guard troops responding to the incident at the Capitol.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Steve Beynon  (@StevenBeynon) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1378040868683276295?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 2, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>The National Guard said in its statement that more than 2,300 Guard members were in Washington, DC, supporting local, state, and federal authorities.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Mark Segraves  (@SegravesNBC4) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1378044247396454402?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 2, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>The National Guard presence is significantly smaller than the more than 25,000 members who were deployed following the riot at the Capitol complex on January 6 and amid the heightened security around President Joe Biden&#39;s inauguration.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60240a4bcca90200129b778e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"national guard capitol\" height=\"3312\" width=\"4960\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Members of Virginia&#39;s National Guard walk by the Capitol on January 17.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Joe Raedle/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>There have been allegations that the Pentagon dragged its feet with the National Guard response to the riot, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/dc-national-guard-capitol-riots-troop-response-2021-3\">delaying a necessary call to action by three hours</a>.</p><p>While the Guard presence has diminished since January, it remains elevated because of persistent security concerns.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/national-guard-immediate-reaction-force-capitol-ramming-incident-2021-4'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.verizon.com%2Fplans%2Funlimited%2Fmited%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored\">Verizon Unlimited</a> customers can get a free year of Discovery Plus, right now. The streaming service gives you access to tons of shows from Discovery, HGTV, Food Network, and more. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/discovery-plus-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">You can read our full Discovery Plus review here</a>.</p><p><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.verizon.com%2Fsolutions-and-services%2Fdiscovery-plus%2F-plus%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Discovery Plus</a> usually costs $5 a month with ads, or $7 a month without ads. But with this special offer, Verizon Play More or Get More Unlimited users, as well as new Fios and 5G Home Internet customers, can get an ad-free subscription, valued at about $84, free for one year. </p><p>Verizon Unlimited plan, Go Unlimited, Beyond Unlimited, Above Unlimited, Do More Unlimited, and Start Unlimited users are eligible for six months of free Discovery Plus access.</p><h2>To redeem your free 6-month, or annual subscription to Discovery Plus, here&#39;s what steps you need to take </h2><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">Log in to your <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.verizon.com%2Fplans%2Funlimited%2Fmited%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Verizon account</a>.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Find the &#34;Account&#34; section at the top and click on the &#34;Add-ons &#38; apps overview&#34; menu item. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">Scroll down to the &#34;Your add-ons&#34; section and click on the &#34;See eligible add-ons&#34; button.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Find Discovery Plus and click the &#34;Get it now&#34; button. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">Click the button to &#34;Go to discovery+,&#34; and finish by creating an account.</li></ul><p>Current Discovery Plus subscribers through Verizon are also eligible for this offer.</p><p>After a year, Discovery Plus users can stick with the ad-free plan for $7 a month, or switch to the ad-supported plan for $5 a month. Of course, you can cancel after a year, too. </p><h2>What if I&#39;m not a Verizon customer?</h2><p>If you&#39;re not a Verizon Unlimited subscriber, you can <a href=\"https://www.discoveryplus.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">try out Discovery Plus</a> and stream &#34;Property Brothers,&#34;  &#34;Deadliest Catch,&#34; &#34;Worst Cooks in America,&#34; &#34;Planet Earth II,&#34; &#34;Dirty Jobs,&#34; or &#34;90-day Fiancé&#34; free for a week. </p><p><a href=\"https://get.discoveryplus.com/how-to-watch\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"990a59acede7bf499974a243ace0fe41\">Discovery Plus</a> is available on most streaming platforms and smart devices, including iOS and Android mobile devices, Apple TV, Android TV, Roku, Amazon Fire TV, Samsung smart TVs, Xbox consoles, Chromecast, and web browsers.  </p><p>If you&#39;re looking for more details regarding Discovery Plus, read our full rundown of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/discovery-plus-streaming-service\">how the streaming service works</a>, and our <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/discovery-plus-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">full review</a>.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/CBD3hi5NZeY\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 02 Apr 2021 21:01:57 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/60132b366dfbe10018e0099c?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"40de200d66c41b66ca05576098c0451e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn88@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-47-298_edadc141a6f7eb9e.webp","destWidth":1280,"destHeight":960,"sourceBytes":96634,"destBytes":96634,"author":"insider@insider.com (Sarah Saril,Tercius Bufete,Ben Blanchet)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/60132b3d6dfbe10018e0099d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn23@2020_4/2021/04/03/04-49-58-792_9d5dcd11d5b3b64b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn57@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-622_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=CBD3hi5NZeY:yCtaBoGv7Tk:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn79@2020_3/2021/04/03/04-49-49-749_501721d364bb8345.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=CBD3hi5NZeY:yCtaBoGv7Tk:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn87@2020_3/2021/04/03/04-49-45-077_59ae5b8f3a0664ef.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=CBD3hi5NZeY:yCtaBoGv7Tk:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn24@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-44-239_634e50e75e2361b1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/CBD3hi5NZeY":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn36@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-46-865_573173532f490792.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425373710},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"Kristi Noem's statement on pipes not being infrastructure sums up her party's confused reaction to Biden's plan","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/kristi-noem-infrastructure-pipes-south-dakota-governor-republicans-fox-news-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60676d4c856cd700198a2f72?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kristi Noem at CPAC\" height=\"2680\" width=\"3573\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://newsroom.ap.org/detail/CPACNoem/7a8b172d13a240ecaa4db796bd5f7e45/photo?Query=cpac&#38;mediaType=photo&#38;sortBy=arrivaldatetime:desc&#38;dateRange=Anytime&#38;totalCount=1758&#38;currentItemNo=19\" target=\"_blank\">AP Photo/John Raoux</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>South Dakota&#39;s Republican Gov. Kristi Noem told Fox News pipes and housing don&#39;t count as infrastructure.</li>\n<li>Her comments sum up the GOP&#39;s messaging that infrastructure only means roads and bridges.</li>\n<li>Biden&#39;s plan argues for a broad rethink of what constitutes infrastructure, and the GOP doesn&#39;t want that.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>President Joe Biden <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-2-trillion-infrastructure-plan-roads-bridges-broadband-power-2021-3\">unveiled</a> the first part of his $4 trillion infrastructure package on Wednesday, and almost immediately a host of Republican lawmakers criticized the bill for allocating funds to measures not specifically related to physical infrastructure, such as climate change and research initiatives.</p><p>South Dakota Republican Gov. Kristi Noem was one of them, but she offered an unorthodox definition of physical infrastructure: one that doesn&#39;t include pipes.</p><p>In an <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7SBn_FLDZ4&t=122s122s\">interview</a> on Thursday, Noem discussed the president&#39;s infrastructure bill with Fox News&#39; Sean Hannity, and as the interview progressed, she elaborated on her definition of infrastructure, saying housing doesn&#39;t qualify either. </p><p>&#34;I was shocked by how much doesn&#39;t go into infrastructure,&#34; Noem said. &#34;It goes into research and development, it goes into housing and pipes and different initiatives, green energy, and it&#39;s not really an honest conversation that we&#39;re having about what this proposal is.&#34;</p><p>Shortly after the interview aired, critics on Twitter highlighted the &#34;pipes&#34; comment in particular, and left-leaning media figures were especially critical. For instance, MSNBC host Mehdi Hasan said Noem had &#34;revealed she doesn&#39;t know what infrastructure is.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Mehdi Hasan  (@mehdirhasan) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1377475821204561921?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 1, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p> </p><p>While Noem&#39;s criticism of the bill was likely the most striking on the Republican side, her party has been unified in trying to label the bill as a Democratic &#34;Trojan Horse,&#34; sneaking non-infrastructure things into an infrastructure plan.</p><p>In a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mitch-mcconnell-slams-bidens-2-trillion-infrastructure-plan-missed-opportunity-2021-4\">statement on Wednesday</a>, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell made the &#34;Trojan Horse&#34; comparison and said that while Biden could have drafted a &#34;serious, targeted infrastructure plan&#34; that could have received bipartisan support, &#34;the latest liberal wish-list the White House has decided to label &#39;infrastructure&#39; is a major missed opportunity by this Administration.&#34; The next day, McConnell said the the bill will <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mcconnell-says-gop-wont-support-infrastructure-plan-2021-4\">not get any Republican support</a>, at least not in the Senate. </p><p>Both McConnell and <a href=\"https://www.republicanleader.gov/bidenomics/\">House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy</a> have trotted out a key statistic to make this point: 6%, as in, less than 6% of Biden&#39;s proposal is dedicated to roads and bridges.</p><p>The truth is that things in the plan outside of that 6% are plausibly related to infrastructure, just not a 20th-century understanding of it. McConnell&#39;s statement highlights that Biden &#34;would spend more money just on electric cars than on America&#39;s roads, bridges, ports, airports, and waterways combined.&#34; </p><p>But the <a href=\"https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2021/03/31/fact-sheet-the-american-jobs-plan/\">White House fact sheet</a> released on Wednesday ahead of Biden&#39;s unveiling of the plan makes the case that it&#39;s time to rethink infrastructure. It notes that the 1936 Rural Electrification Act involved a federal investment in bringing electricity to nearly every home in the US, and it&#39;s time to do the same for broadband internet and electric vehicles. Republicans are saying they don&#39;t want to have that rethink.</p><p>Some Republican voters seem open to it, more than half of them in some cases. Insider&#39;s Juliana Kaplan <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-do-republican-voters-think-of-bidens-infrastructure-proposals-poll-2021-4\">reported</a> on Friday that Republicans and Democrats&#39; definitions of infrastructure may be different in large part because of <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2021/04/01/kristi-noem-hannity-biden-infrastructure-plan/\">regional political polarization</a>, but that even so, a Morning Consult/Politico <a href=\"https://assets.morningconsult.com/wp-uploads/2021/03/31082502/2103166_crosstabs_POLITICO_RVs_v1_AUTO.pdf\">poll</a> shows significant levels of support among Republican voters for funding low-income housing, among other things. </p><p>But regardless of the consistency of Republican rhetoric on Biden&#39;s infrastructure plan, the comments serve to illustrate the likely legislative outcome: zero Republican votes for it. This multitrillion-dollar plan may end up the same as Biden&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stimulus-biden-signs-trillion-covid-relief-package-checks-direct-payments-2021-3\">$1.9 trillion stimulus</a>, which didn&#39;t get a single vote in the House or the Senate.</p><p>Noem&#39;s office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/kristi-noem-infrastructure-pipes-south-dakota-governor-republicans-fox-news-2021-4'>Business Insider</a></div><div Studios</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>&#34;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#34; premiered on <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Disney Plus</a> subscription costs $8 a month or $80 per year.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode><p>&#34;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#34; is the latest TV series set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The show debuted on March 19, and new episodes premiere every Friday on Disney Plus. You can subscribe to <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus for $8 a month or $80 a year</a>.</p><p>Anthony Mackie and Sebastian Stan reprise their &#34;Avengers&#34; roles for the six episode series, while Daniel Bruhl and Emily VanCamp return as Baron Helmut Zero and Sharon Carter from &#34;Captain America: Civil War.&#34;</p><p>&#34;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#34; pits the heroes against a familiar antagonist in Baron Zemo. Mackie&#39;s Sam Wilson inherited Captain America&#39;s shield at the conclusion of &#34;Avengers: Endgame,&#34; but the series will explore why he still uses the codename Falcon. Stan&#39;s Bucky Barnes was Captain America&#39;s best friend, but his violent past as the Winter Soldier continues to haunt him.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ojGHE581lsM\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\"></iframe><p>In Marvel&#39;s comic books, both Falcon and the Winter Soldier eventually take on the mantle of Captain America, albeit for just a few years. It&#39;s unclear if either will emerge as the next Captain America in the MCU; <a href=\"https://variety.com/2021/tv/news/anthony-mackie-the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier-1234919610/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Mackie told Variety</a> there&#39;s been no discussions of a second season and he&#39;s not sure when he&#39;ll appear in another MCU film.</p><p>&#34;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#34; and &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>&#34; are considered the first entries in phase four of the Marvel Cinematic Universe; the first film in phase four, &#34;Black Widow,&#34; is scheduled to hit theaters and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-premiere-access\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Disney Plus Premier Access</a> in July 2021.</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Updated on 4/2/2021 by Steven Cohen:</strong> This article has been updated with new pricing details for Disney Plus.</p></aside><h2><strong>How to watch &#39;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#39;</strong></h2><p>&#34;The Falcon and the Winter Soldier&#34; premiered on <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> on March 19. The series will feature six episodes in total, and new episodes arrive every Friday. The season finale will debut on April 23.</p><p>You can visit <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">DisneyPlus.com</a> or download the Disney Plus app to sign up for the service. Disney Plus costs $8 for a monthly plan or $80 annually. If you&#39;re also interested in subscribing to Hulu or ESPN+, you can sign up for a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-bundle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">discounted bundle with Disney Plus starting at $14 a month</a>. </p><p>The Disney Plus app is available on Apple devices, Android, Roku, Fire TV, Chromecast, and most <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-tv-under-500-dollars\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">smart TVs</a>. Disney Plus includes support for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-4k\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">4K resolution</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-hdr-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HDR</a> (high dynamic range) contrast on compatible displays.</p><h2><strong>What other movies and shows can I watch on Disney Plus?</strong></h2><p>On top of the classic library of Disney movies and shows, <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is the streaming home to nearly every movie in the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/marvel-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Marvel Cinematic Universe</a>, and new shows like &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>.&#34;</p><p>It has films starring other Marvel characters as well, like the &#34;X-Men&#34; and &#34;Fantastic Four.&#34;</p><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/564546/9358?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.disneyplus.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> also collects the full &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/star-wars-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Star Wars</a>&#34; franchise, including TV shows, documentaries and specials created for kids. The &#34;Star Wars&#34; series &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-mandalorian\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The Mandalorian</a>&#34; is the most popular exclusive show on Disney Plus.</p><p>For detailed impressions, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out our full Disney Plus review here</a>.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"The CDC walked back comments from its director suggesting that vaccinated people couldn't 'carry the virus'","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-vaccination-comments-director-rochelle-walensky-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60677695a7d803001963e92b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Walenski CDC US\" height=\"2805\" width=\"3741\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rochelle Walensky.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kevin Lamarque/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>On Thursday, the CDC walked back claims made earlier in the week by its director.</li>\n<li>CDC Director Rochelle Walensky <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-director-data-vaccinated-people-do-not-carry-covid-19-2021-3\">said</a> vaccinated people do not carry the COVID-19 virus.</li>\n<li>After pushback from the scientific community, the CDC <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/01/health/coronavirus-vaccine-walensky.html\">told The New York Times</a> she &#34;spoke broadly.&#34;</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Thursday distanced itself from comments made by its director, Rochelle Walensky, who earlier in the week <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-director-data-vaccinated-people-do-not-carry-covid-19-2021-3\">suggested</a> that vaccinated people do not carry the COVID-19 virus.</p><p>A CDC spokesperson <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/01/health/coronavirus-vaccine-walensky.html\">told The New York Times</a> that Walensky &#34;spoke broadly&#34; and that the evidence to support her claim &#34;isn&#39;t clear.&#34;</p><p>&#34;It&#39;s possible that some people who are fully vaccinated could get Covid-19. The evidence isn&#39;t clear whether they can spread the virus to others. We are continuing to evaluate the evidence,&#34; the spokesperson added.</p><p>During an MSNBC interview with <a href=\"https://www.msnbc.com/transcripts/transcript-rachel-maddow-show-3-29-21-n1262442\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"8fb1ac29eb919bb0cfb2f91b036c0595\">Rachel Maddow on Monday</a>, Walensky said: &#34;Our data from the CDC today suggests that vaccinated people do not carry the virus, don&#39;t get sick. And that it&#39;s not just in the clinical trials, but it&#39;s also in real-world data.&#34;</p><p>Criticism brewed in the scientific community after Walensky&#39;s comments.</p><p>A day before the MSNBC interview, the CDC released <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-pfizer-and-moderna-vaccines-effective-in-the-real-world-2021-3\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"9ad571df3d36e476c8400752ef3e19ce\">data</a> suggesting that people who have been fully vaccinated almost never carry the coronavirus. Walensky referenced the data during the interview.</p><p>The CDC&#39;s study released Monday specifically reported that one dose of the Moderna or Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine registered at least 80% effectiveness in preventing infection and the full two doses showed 90% effectiveness.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a prominent on Netflix&#39;s daily top-10 lists that week. </li>\n<li>Netflix counts a view if an account watches a movie or TV show for at least two minutes.</li>\n<li>The kids animated movie &#34;Secret Magic Control Agency&#34; topped this week&#39;s list. The documentary &#34;Seaspiracy&#34; was also popular.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t9. \"Elizabeth and Margaret: Love and Loyalty\" (2020)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065dbd1daf0f10018f99750?format=jpeg\" alt=\"elizabeth and margaret love and loyalty\" height=\"1054\" width=\"1405\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Channel Five</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81438846\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"This documentary takes an intimate look at the complex, widely misunderstood relationship between Queen Elizabeth II and her sister, Princess Margaret.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: N/A</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: N/A</p>\n\t8. \"The Secret Life of Pets 2\" (2019)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5de51eeb695b5846946d2ba2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"secret life of pets 2 universal\" height=\"720\" width=\"1280\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Universal</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81044813\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"3afe8d498675c6d493fde705561403d7\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"On a farm outside New York, Max aims to boost his confidence while in the city, Snowball attempts to rescue a tiger cub and Gidget pretends to be a cat.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 60%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"The sequel to 2016's animated hit is even thinner on plot than the first one, whose title promised a look behind the scenes and inside the minds of cats and dogs.\" &#8212; <a href=\"http://www.detnews.com/apps/pbcs.dll/section?Category=ENT02\">Detroit News</a></p>\n\t7. \"Operation Varsity Blues: The College Admissions Scandal\" (2021, Netflix original)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/605e20a28f71c3001853a8a6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Operation Varsity Blues: The College Admissions Scandal\" height=\"1064\" width=\"1424\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81130691?source=35\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"caee83c048dd200506910d43884ac18d\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"Reenactments drive this documentary investigating the mastermind behind a scam to get the kids of rich and famous families into top US universities.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 89%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"His story might not be over yet, but 'Operation Varsity Blues' suggests that even if Singer goes down, the problem he exploited shows no sign of letting up.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.indiewire.com/2021/03/operation-varsity-blues-college-admissions-scandal-review-1234623090/\">Indiewire</a></p>\n\t6. \"Deadly Illusions\" (2021)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/605e152d8e71b30018519066?format=jpeg\" alt=\"deadly illusions\" height=\"1302\" width=\"2184\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kiss and Tale Productions</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81346196\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"6bd17f540780f267577698d61b5853f4\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"After a bestselling novelist suffering from writer's block hires a new nanny for her children, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 10%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"Movies don't come much clunkier than 'Deadly Illusions,' an unconvincing mishmash of psychodrama and erotic thriller filled with silly plot holes, obvious dialogue, and risibly bad actions and reactions.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.latimes.com/entertainment-arts/movies/story/2021-03-18/review-deadly-illusions-kristin-davis-erotic-thriller\">Los Angeles Times</a></p>\n\t5. \"A Week Away\" (2021, Netflix original)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e1b4902281001950a909?format=jpeg\" alt=\"a week away\" height=\"1134\" width=\"1512\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81183451\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"In this uplifting musical, a troubled teen takes a leap of faith by attending summer camp &#8212; and unexpectedly finds love, friends and a place to belong.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 47%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"This is a film as tidy, transparent and kid-friendly as a square of Jell-O salad, and so squishily eager-to-please that it doesn't engage with its religious themes so much as tuck them into song lyrics to hover in the narrative like grapes.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/26/movies/a-week-away-review.html\">New York Times</a></p>\n\t4. \"Yes Day\" (2021, Netflix original)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60391844d920880018592321?format=jpeg\" alt=\"yes day netflix\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Edgar Ramírez and Jennifer Garner in &#34;Yes Day.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81011712?source=35\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"80\" data-uri=\"7ec9ec1b87393dc574401cdb26fef71d\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"A mom and dad who usually say no decide to say yes to their kids' wildest requests &#8212; with a few ground rules &#8212; on a whirlwind day of fun and adventure.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 47%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"Parents will be amused with the antics that ensue. The kids will love it.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.mercurynews.com/2021/03/15/quick-review-zack-snyders-justice-league-brilliantly-rights-all-the-wrongs/\">San Jose Mercury News</a></p>\n\t3. \"Seaspiracy\" (2021, Netflix original)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6065e2ce52f11d001943192a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"seaspiracy\" height=\"981\" width=\"1308\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Netflix</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/81014008\"><strong>Description</strong></a>: \"Passionate about ocean life, a filmmaker sets out to document the harm that humans do to marine species &#8212; and uncovers alarming global corruption.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 83%</p><p><strong>What critics said</strong>: \"Seaspiracy is both well-researched and informative, and at times genuinely shocking ... If shock and awe are what it takes to get the message across, then Seaspiracy is effective, if not particularly multifaceted.\" &#8212; <a href=\"https://www.thrillist.com/entertainment/nation/seaspiracy-netflix-documentary-review\">Thrillist</a></p>\n\t2. \"Bad Trip\" (2021, Netflix original)\n\t<figure>\n\t<img friends bond on a wild road trip to New York as they pull real people into their raunchy, raucous antics.\"</p><p><strong>Rotten Tomatoes critic score</strong>: 73%</p><p><strong>What critics 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"Rep. Matt Gaetz reportedly bragged about the 'access' to younger women he got from a former government official who was indicted for sex trafficking","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/rep-matt-gaetz-also-showed-photos-of-nude-women-to-florida-political-allies-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6067ae20856cd700198a3079?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Matt Gaetz\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rep. Matt Gaetz.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Photo by Michael Ciaglo/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz reportedly bragged about how he got &#34;access&#34; to women from a Florida tax collector who&#39;s since been indicted for sex trafficking.</li>\n<li>The former tax collector, Joel Greenberg, introduced Gaetz to the women, The Washington Post reported.</li>\n<li>The DOJ is now investigating whether Gaetz had sex with a minor and broke sex trafficking laws.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The Washington Post <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/matt-gaetz-joel-greenberg/2021/04/02/195ecd16-934c-11eb-a74e-1f4cf89fd948_story.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">reported</a> on Friday that Rep. Matt Gaetz rescheduled Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis&#39; campaign events in 2018 so that they&#39;d &#34;end the night in a college town.&#34;</p><p>Gaetz was assisting DeSantis&#39; gubernatorial campaign at the time, and sources told the outlet that Gaetz sought to hang out with younger crowds during the election.</p><p>A source also told The Post that Gaetz boasted about the &#34;access&#34; to women he got from associating with Joel Greenberg, a former Florida tax collector who was indicted last year on 14 felony counts, including carrying out the sex trafficking of a minor between the ages of 14 and 17. Greenberg has pleaded not guilty.</p><p>&#34;Matt was never shy about talking about his relationship to Joel and the access to women that Joel provided him,&#34; the source said. The Post also reported that Gaetz showed photos and videos of nude women to people involved in Florida politics.</p><p>People who heard Gaetz and Greenberg discuss their encounters said that Greenberg introduced Gaetz to women, and that Gaetz had sex with them and later showed photos of them to people in Florida.</p><p>&#34;What these videos implied was that there was something of a sexual nature going on with everyone,&#34; the source told The Post.</p><p>Friday&#39;s revelation follows news from the New York Times that the Justice Department has been investigating whether Gaetz broke federal sex trafficking laws and whether he engaged in an illegal sexual relationship with a 17-year-old.</p><p>The Times also revealed that Gaetz&#39;s investigation was linked to an investigation into Greenberg and that the two men <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/matt-gaetz-investigation-looking-into-cash-paid-directly-women-nyt-2021-4\">had paid women</a> for sex at various Florida hotels. As part of the wide-ranging investigation, the Justice Department is said to be examining whether Gaetz <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/doj-investigating-if-matt-gaetz-misused-campaign-funds-for-travel-2021-4\">used campaign money</a> during his encounters with women.</p><p>On Thursday, CNN reported that Gaetz showed House colleagues photos and videos of nude women and bragged about his sex life.</p><p>The Post&#39;s reporting on Friday indicates that Gaetz may have engaged in the same behavior at parties with Greenberg and others involved in Florida politics.</p><p>Earlier Friday, Gaetz&#39;s spokesperson, Luke Ball, <a href=\"https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=newssearch&cd=&ved=0ahUKEwi7nIKq6uDvAhUIr54KHYBbAmMQxfQBCEIwAg&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.businessinsider.com%2Fmatt-gaetz-spokesperson-resigns-amid-sex-trafficking-allegations-2021-4&usg=AOvVaw3370SZMsVWOJ-Ip16eqJYxusg=AOvVaw3370SZMsVWOJ-Ip16eqJYx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">resigned</a> from his position, citing principle as the reason, according to NBC News.</p><p>&#34;I have never paid for sex. I have never had sex with an underage person as an adult,&#34; Gaetz told the Post. &#34;I have dated women in college and graduate school, and have boasted about how great they are across the board, as boyfriends do. At times women I have dated have joined me at campaign events.&#34;</p><p>Gaetz is also alleged to have sought sexual encounters on websites like Seeking Arrangements and is reported to have used drugs and given drugs to a woman during at least one of the experiences, according to the Times.</p><p>According to the Post, an anonymous complaint was submitted to former House Speaker Paul Ryan&#39;s office in 2018 about Gaetz making a young female staffer uncomfortable. Ryan&#39;s staffers reportedly had a conversation with Gaetz, but the issue was not looked into any further.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a Sheth)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6067ae20856cd700198a3079?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn23@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-51-405_20885953abd776c0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn57@2020_1/2021/04/03/04-49-56-622_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=XraIla_dg1U:knONAQ7GagQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn43@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-996_2f0e37e175c74184.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=XraIla_dg1U:knONAQ7GagQ:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn24@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-57-659_1813bfadce6cd16f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/03/04-49-50-912_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=XraIla_dg1U:knONAQ7GagQ:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn52@2020_2/2021/04/03/04-49-54-670_725230b894ba4fd9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/XraIla_dg1U":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn38@2020_5/2021/04/03/04-49-51-558_0498117f49d19ae2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1617425373630},{"createdTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","updatedTime":"2021-04-03 12:49:33","title":"Republicans say Biden's not focused on infrastructure, but their voters like some of his proposals","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-do-republican-voters-think-of-bidens-infrastructure-proposals-poll-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60674578a7d803001963e79d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"President Joe Biden boarding an Amtrak train with a mask on\" height=\"2434\" width=\"3245\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>President Joe Biden boarding an Amtrak train during the presidential campaign, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2020, in Pittsburgh.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Andrew Harnik/AP Photo</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Republicans have been bristling at how President Joe Biden is defining infrastructure.</li>\n<li>Their critique: His package isn&#39;t focusing on things that are actually infrastructure.</li>\n<li>A Morning Consult/Politico poll found over <strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">half of GOP voters</strong> support funding low-income housing.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A new debate is brewing over President Joe Biden&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-2-trillion-infrastructure-plan-roads-bridges-broadband-power-2021-3\">infrastructure package</a>: What, exactly, is infrastructure?</p><p>According to the $2 trillion plan Biden unveiled this week, infrastructure encompasses everything from broadband access to childcare to care workers. Republicans say that&#39;s a far cry from rebuilding roads and bridges.</p><p>&#34;Our nation could use a serious, targeted infrastructure plan. There would be bipartisan support for a smart proposal,&#34; Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mitch-mcconnell-slams-bidens-2-trillion-infrastructure-plan-missed-opportunity-2021-4\">said on Wednesday</a>. &#34;Unfortunately, the latest liberal wish-list the White House has decided to label &#39;infrastructure&#39; is a major missed opportunity by this Administration.&#34;</p><p>The next day, McConnell indicated that the current infrastructure package likely <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/mcconnell-says-gop-wont-support-infrastructure-plan-2021-4\">won&#39;t get any GOP votes</a>, at least in the Senate. His rhetoric around a sweeping view of infrastructure has been echoed by fellow conservatives like Kristi Noem, the governor of South Dakota, who <a href=\"https://www.huffpost.com/entry/kristi-noem-infrastructure-fox-news_n_60657319c5b63387414841ef\">said in a Fox News interview</a> that the package went into things like pipes, housing, and research - none of which she considers infrastructure.</p><p>As <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2021/04/01/kristi-noem-hannity-biden-infrastructure-plan/\">The Washington Post&#39;s Greg Sargent</a> notes in an opinion column, placing research and development outside of the scope of infrastructure is a departure from previous GOP thinking. Sargent also notes that with Republicans and Democrats increasingly segregated by region, different definitions of infrastructure are taking on a regional divide as well. Biden&#39;s infrastructure proposals have a decidedly more urban focus, and of course, Democrats tend to live in cities and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/idea-of-american-suburbs-false-revealed-election-biden-trump-2020-11\">dense suburbs</a>. </p><p>But while Republican politicians have made clear how they&#39;d like to define infrastructure, what do actual Republican voters think?</p><h2>What the polling shows about Republican voters&#39; support for Biden&#39;s infrastructure proposal</h2><p>A <a href=\"https://assets.morningconsult.com/wp-uploads/2021/03/31082502/2103166_crosstabs_POLITICO_RVs_v1_AUTO.pdf\">Morning Consult/Politico poll</a> delved into how 2,043 respondents felt about different prospective aspects of the two-pronged infrastructure package, asking: &#34;To what extent do you support or oppose funding for the following being included in the infrastructure plan being developed by the Biden administration?&#34;</p><p>The poll found more than half of Republican voters either strongly or somewhat support funding for increased housing-options for low-income Americans (53%), and almost half do for an extension of the expanded child tax credit (49%). A significant minority do for the widespread availability of electric-vehicle charging stations (40%) and free community college (38%), while research on climate change and universal pre-K accrued the support of more than a third (37% and 36%, respectively).</p><p>The proposals that got more tepid support were the extension of Affordable Care Act subsidies (34%) and conversion of transportation sector to run on electric power (28%). Bringing up the rear of the polling were reduced tuition at historically Black colleges and universities (24%) and free tuition at historically Black colleges and universities (14%).</p><p>Here&#39;s how the answers broke down along party lines:</p><h2>Conversion of transportation sector to run on electric power</h2><p>Broadly, 25% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 27% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>40% of Democrats strongly support, while 32% somewhat support</li><li>20% of Independents strongly support, while 29% somewhat support</li><li>8% of Republicans strongly support, while 20% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Research on climate change</h2><p>Broadly, 38% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 25% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>60% of Democrats strongly support, while 25% somewhat support</li><li>34% of Independents strongly support, while 28% somewhat support</li><li>14% of Republicans strongly support, while 23% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Widespread availability of electric-vehicle charging stations</h2><p>Broadly, 29% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 30% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>42% of Democrats strongly support, while 31% somewhat support</li><li>26% of Independents strongly support, while 31% somewhat support</li><li>13% of Republicans strongly support, while 27% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Increased housing options for low-income Americans</h2><p>Broadly, 41% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 29% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>61% of Democrats strongly support, while 26% somewhat support</li><li>36% of Independents strongly support, while 32% somewhat support</li><li>21% of Republicans strongly support, while 32% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Universal Pre-K</h2><p>Broadly, 31% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 25% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>45% of Democrats strongly support, while 30% somewhat support</li><li>29% of Independents strongly support, while 24% somewhat support</li><li>15% of Republicans strongly support, while 21% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Free community college</h2><p>Broadly, 37% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 23% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>54% of Democrats strongly support, while 25% somewhat support</li><li>34% of Independents strongly support, while 24% somewhat support</li><li>18% of Republicans strongly support, while 20% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Reduced tuition at historically Black colleges and universities</h2><p>Broadly, 24% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 24% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>39% of Democrats strongly support, while 29% somewhat support</li><li>19% of Independents strongly support, while 25% somewhat support</li><li>8% of Republicans strongly support, while 16% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Free tuition at historically Black colleges and universities</h2><p>Broadly, 21% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 17% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>36% of Democrats strongly support, while 24% somewhat support</li><li>17% of Independents strongly support, while 15% somewhat support</li><li>6% of Republicans strongly support, while 8% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Extension of the child tax credit expansion</h2><p>Broadly, 32% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 30% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>45% of Democrats strongly support, while 29% somewhat support</li><li>25% of Independents strongly support, while 30% somewhat support</li><li>20% of Republicans strongly support, while 29% somewhat support</li></ul><h2>Extension of Affordable Care Act subsidies</h2><p>Broadly, 34% of voters strongly supported this measure, while 25% of voters somewhat supported it. </p><ul><li>57% of Democrats strongly support, while 25% somewhat support</li><li>27% of Independents strongly support, while 25% somewhat support</li><li>10% of Republicans strongly support, while 24% somewhat support</li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the Ron DeSantis issued an executive order on Friday banning state agencies from issuing &#34;vaccine passports.&#34;</p><p>Local businesses also can&#39;t require the vaccine passports, according to the executive order.</p><p>On Monday, DeSantis <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/florida-governor-ron-desantis-will-ban-vaccine-passports-2021-3\">said he opposed the idea</a> as President Joe Biden reportedly pushes for vaccine documentation.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Jay O&#39;Brien  (@jayobtv) <a William Evans died of his injuries after a car rammed into an outside barrier at the Capitol.</li>\n<li>Flags at the Capitol, White House, and other federal buildings were flown at half-staff to honor the fallen officer.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The Capitol Police officer who died after a car rammed into a barrier outside the Capitol was honored with a police procession on Friday.</p><p>Video footage of the procession shows officers from both the Capitol Police force and Metropolitan Police Department, as well as members of the Secret Service, standing at attention for a motorcade carrying the body of fallen officer William &#34;Billy&#34; Evans, an 18-year veteran of the USCP.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-James Harnett  (@jarharnett) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1378079864335577090?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 2, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\"
